metadata.title: Exo Terra Carbon Bag, PT3638
features: Eliminates discolorations to keep water crystal clear
Effectively removes heavy metals, organic contaminants and pollutants
This item can be used for Model PT3630 Filter
description: 2 Replacement Carbon Pads for use with Exo Terra Turtle Filter FX-200 (PT3630). The Exo Terra External Turtle Filter helps provide a clean and healthy environment for your turtle.
